text: Tyanci avastha asi ahe ki jevha tyancya samora allahace namahsmarana kele jate, tevha tyancya hrdayaca tharakapa hoto, jevha tyacyavara sankata yete tevha tya sankatata dhira- sanyama rakhatata, te namaja kayama karanare aheta, ani je kahi amhi tyanna de'una thevale ahe tyatuna deta hi rahatata
